txt.en: Any창mat harbours aspirations of being a great shanty-man.

'[placeholder], it's good to see you again. I had hoped I would have a new shanty to share with you, but despite our adventures, when I began to write, the words did not come to me.

'After the rush of excitement wore off, all I felt was tired and worn out. The small cuts I earned from fighting that big crab sting, and my legs ache from dashing about the island. And then I thought, what if the sailor's life is not for me?

'But then I thought of the freebooters we met, how welcoming and giving they were. I had expected them to be rough around the edges. Are my perceptions of life at sea shaped by tall tales and silly stories?

'Have I been chasing a false ideal?

'Thank you for travelling with me today and for keeping me safe. I did not get what I wanted out of today, but maybe that is all right.

'May our paths cross again.'
Any창mat has worked hard to write new verses for a shanty and would love to show them off to you.\n\nTalk to Any창mat in Halrax.
'[placeholder], I'm glad you are here. I have had much to think about after our adventures.'
